Package src

Class Heuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Heuristic
  • public class Heuristic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides all the necessary functionality to evaluate a specific map.

      • multiplier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Heuristic

        public Heuristic​(Map map,
                 int myColor,
                 boolean printOn,
                 boolean extendedPrint,
                 double[][] multiplier,
                 StaticHeuristicPerPhase shpp)
        This Constructor creates a Heuristic object. Here all the necessary information is set.
        Parameters:
        map - The map that the heuristic evaluates.
        myColor - The number(color) of the player for which the map is rated.
        printOn - boolean that defines if the heuristic should print the medium amount of information.
        extendedPrint - boolean that defines if the heuristic should print all the information.
        multiplier - list of double values to define the multipliers for the different heuristically evaluations.
        shpp - The StaticHeuristicPerPhase object, that contains all the necessary information about the field values and waves per phase.

    • Method Detail

      • updateHeuristicMultipliers

        public void updateHeuristicMultipliers​(boolean phaseOne)
        Function updates the Heuristic Multipliers according to the current GameStage
        Parameters:
        phaseOne - Indicates if we are in phase one or not

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap​(Map mapToUpdateWith)
        Updates the Map object (if it was cloned for example). Also updates th dynamic infos. The general Map needs to be the same as the one the heuristic got initialized with.
        Parameters:
        mapToUpdateWith - The new Map object to update the infos with

      • evaluate

        public double evaluate​(boolean phaseOne,
                       boolean timed,
                       boolean ServerLog,
                       long UpperTimeLimit)
                throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Method to evaluate the current map of the heuristic.
        Parameters:
        phaseOne - indicates if we're in phase one
        timed - indicates if there is a time limit
        ServerLog - indicates if the method should output information
        UpperTimeLimit - the time limit
        Returns:
        returns the value of the map.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - Throws TimeoutException if the method didn't get to finish in time.

      • fastEvaluate

        public static double fastEvaluate​(Map map,
                                  int myPlayerNr)
        Method to evaluate the current map of the heuristic. Here only a very fast evaluation is made so that it doesn't take as much time as evaluate().
        Parameters:
        map - Map that gets evaluated.
        myPlayerNr - player the map gets evaluated for.
        Returns:
        returns the value of the map.

      • bombEvaluate

        public long bombEvaluate​(Map map)
        Method to evaluate the current map of the heuristic in the bomb phase.
        Parameters:
        map - map that gets evaluated
        Returns:
        returns the value of the map.

      • evaluateOverwriteMove

        public boolean evaluateOverwriteMove​(Position pos)
        Evaluation method to evaluate if a given overwrite move should be considered.
        Parameters:
        pos - position where the move would be made to.
        Returns:
        true if the overwrite-position should be considered. False otherwise

      • selectBombOrOverwrite

        public int selectBombOrOverwrite()
        Evaluation method that evaluates if a bomb, or an overwrite-stone should be taken.
        Returns:
        20 if a bomb should be taken and 21 if an overwrite-stone should be taken.

      • printMatrix

        public void printMatrix​(int phase)
        prints out the evaluation matrix
        Parameters:
        phase - stage the map is in.
